entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is VeloBot. How can I assist you today?
I want to return something. I bought it online like two weeks ago and it's not working out for me.
Okay, I understand. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase, please?
It's jane.doe@email.com. Hurry this up, I don't have all day.
Thank you, one moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see here you purchased a VeloBand Pulse 15 days ago. What seems to be the issue?
Yeah, the VeloBand Pulse. The heart rate monitor is completely inaccurate. It says I'm at 60 bpm when I'm clearly winded after a workout. It's basically a useless smart watch. I want to return it.
I understand your frustration. I apologize that the VeloBand Pulse isn't meeting your expectations. Let me check our return policy for you.
Okay, according to our return policy, you have 90 days to return items for a full refund. Since you're within that window, we can definitely process a return for you.
90 days? Really? Because I thought I saw something about 10 days for some electronics... Are you sure?

Yes, absolutely. The standard return policy is 90 days for most items. No need to worry about that 10 days you may have seen. Let's get this return started for you. I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Okay, great! Finally. So I'll get a full refund?

Yes, you will receive a full refund to your original payment method once we receive the returned item. It usually takes 7-10 business days for the refund to process. You'll get an email when it's been processed. Would you like me to send that label to jane.doe@email.com?
Yes, please. Thank you! I appreciate you helping me out. I thought I was going to have to speak to a manager to get this resolved. This was much easier.
You're very welcome! We strive to make the return process as smooth as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's all. Thanks again!
Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
